page.title: 19FURTHER WILD FLOWERS
page.content: {Other wild flowers the children {brought in were:}lesser willowherb, greater willowherb, knapweed, sanicle, pencilled cranesbill, bistort, valerian, hedge woundwort, butterbur, slender thistle, fumitory, cut-leaved cranesbill, ivy-leaved toadflax, water avens, sorrel, pink and white clover, comfrey, small flowered dove'sfoot, cranesbill, ladysmock, herb Robert, common hempnettle, sea bindweed, plantain, white bryony, spurge, mignonette, yellow pimpernel. {The class made a chart of all the wild {flowers that they could find. They {put them in colour columns, white, {red, green, blue and yellow. }
